<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>158100</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3127</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Reading Cards -No 27: News of the Week</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lesekarten - Nr. 27: Nachrichten der Woche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cartes de Lecture - Non 27 : Nouvelles de 
la semaine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cartões Da Leitura - No. 27: Notícia da 
semana</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Schedi Della Lettura - No 27: Notizie della
settimana</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κάρτες ανάγνωσης - αριθ. 27: Ειδήσεις της 
εβδομάδας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tarjetas De la Lectura - No 27: Noticias de
la semana</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An internet based writing activity where the student writes a letter to the editor about a news article which he read on an online newspaper.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">information retrieval</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">internet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">news</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">newspaper</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">article</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Internet gründete Schreiben Aktivität, in 
der der Kursteilnehmer einen Leserbrief über einen Nachrichten 
Artikel schreibt, den er auf einer Onlinezeitung las.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un Internet a basé l'activité d'écriture où 
l'étudiant écrit une lettre à l'éditeur au sujet d'un article de 
nouvelles qu'il a lu sur un journal en ligne.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um Internet baseou a atividade da escrita onde o 
estudante escreve uma letra ao editor sobre um artigo da notícia que 
leia em um jornal em linha.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un Internet ha basato l'attività di scrittura 
dove l'allievo scrive una lettera all'editore circa un articolo di 
notizie che ha letto su un giornale in linea.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα Διαδίκτυο βάσισε τη δραστηριότητα γραψίματος 
όπου ο σπουδαστής γράφει μια επιστολή στον επεξεργαστή για ένα 
άρθρο ειδήσεων που διάβασε σε μια σε απευθείας σύνδεση 
εφημερίδα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un Internet basó la actividad de la escritura 
donde el estudiante escribe una letra al editor sobre un artículo de 
las noticias que él leyó en un periódico en línea.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Information Retrieval</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Internet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nachrichten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Artikel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
